transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Haan, good evening sir, main Aasim Khan bol raha tha IndiaMART se, kaise hain aap sir?
Customer: Ji Aasim ji, badhiya hun, haan ji boliye Aasim ji aap.
Executive: Woh kal sir meri aapse haan baat hui thi na, toh maine sir aage aapka diya bhi tha. Toh aapke paas Suman ka call wagera aaya tha sir aapke paas?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Aapke paas call aaya tha?
Customer: Nahi sir koi call nahi.
Executive: Achha, maine na sir apne senior se bhi, maine aapke apne senior se bhi discuss kar liya tha. Main yeh sir aapka na yahan se initiate karwa raha hun, yaani ki refund wagera, service closer wagera. Toh sir maan ke chalo sir 10 se 15 din ka time lag jayega sir aapka isme aane mein sir.
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Toh aap pareshan mat hoiye, haan, haan, aap pareshan mat hoiyega, aap yeh mat sochiyega ke bola aur refund nahi aaya, main isliye aapko bol raha hun. Kyunki sir jaise service kya hoti hai, activate hoti hai, phir usko band karte hain toh woh pura kuch check kara jaata hai. Aur main dobara aapko yeh bolna chahunga sir agar aap...
Customer: Ji, ji bataye, bataye.
Executive: Yeh main batata hun aapki dobara main, dobara main yahi bolna chahunga sir agar aapka plan ho toh aap dekh sakte ho isko sir continue rakhne ke liye sir.
Customer: Sir dekhiye plan hai nahi, kyun nahi hai, kyunki aap khud mera account khol lijiye. Theek hai? Aur aap check kijiye mujhe pichle 15 din mein kitni calls aayi hain.
Executive: Dekho calls toh sir jaise jaise aap service use...
Customer: Nahi nahi sir dekhiye main pehle hi aapko bata chuka, main pehle hi chhe mahine apne barbaad kar chuka. Aur ab main, theek hai main continue rakh leta hun, aap ek kaam kar dijiye. Aap mujhe company se return mein dilwa dijiyega agar three months mein bhi meri calls inquiry improve nahi hui toh mujhe aaj ki, aaj ki date se, theek hai? Jo, refund ho jayega, kara denge.
Executive: Sir main apni job khatre mein aapko daal kar kyun bataun sir, main jo cheez possible hi nahi hai, return mein toh hum kuch dete hi nahi hain sir. Na pehle aapko return mein diya hoga, maine sirf ek personal base pe aapko bola, maine yeh nahi bola ki sir main aapka dekho aapke liye maine initiate nahi liya ya aage main aapka refund nahi karwa raha hun ya kuch hai, maine sirf ek apni personal suggestion ke taur pe maine bola ki ek baar aap aur vichar kar sakte hain.
Customer: Bade wala tha one ke ji wala, haan. Nahi bhaiya thank you, main Aasim ji rakhna hi nahi chahta, baaki main yeh bol raha hun jaise aap 15 din mein refund karenge, toh kitna amount refund karenge?
Executive: Sir yeh jo bhi service aapki service jo start hui hai woh 12 November ko hui hai.
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Haan ji, haan ji.
Customer: Sir 12 November ko aapki service activate hui hai. Toh 12 se sir aap laga lo, yaani ki 12 se 30 kitne hue, 18 din yeh ho gaye, toh paanch chhe din aur laga lo.
Executive: Sir yaani ki agar main, waise main koshish karunga ke do teen din, maximum jo time hota hai sir woh seven to ten days hota hai, but teen chaar din hum yuhi extra leke chalte hain, kyunki Saturday Sunday bhi aati hai aur kuch na kuch woh bhi.
Customer: Maine aapka 40, maine aapka 47,000 pay kiya tha, mujhe refund kitna hone wala hai?
Executive: Sir main aapko bata raha hun, 47,000 aapne payment kara tha, toh aap laga lo sir aapne kareeb yeh 20 din ki aap service use kar loge, utna minus hoga sir aapka.
Customer: Theek hai sir, kara dijiye aap.
Executive: Theek hai, yaani ki jaise woh 12, 12 ko aapka start hua tha, 18 din toh aapke yahi ho gaye, Saturday Sunday office close rahega toh 18 din yeh ho gaye aur kya kehte hain paanch chhe din mein aur maan lo toh 23, 24 din ka paisa aapka katega sir.
Customer: Theek hai sir, karwa dijiye aap.
Executive: Theek hai, toh main aapko pehle isliye bata ke chal raha hun aur aap bilkul nishchint rahiyega, maine aage process karwa diya hai toh thoda sa patience rakhiyega sir. Dobara yaani ki agar koi dikkat ho kuch ho baat karna ho.
Customer: Nahi, nahi koi baat nahi hai, jo mera aaj tak ka hua hai woh toh aapka dekho koi dikkat nahi, aap kara dijiye theek hai.
Executive: Nahi sir, main wahi bol raha hun sir aaj tak ka toh aapka hai, baaki abhi chaar paanch din aur lagenge isliye main aapko pehle bata ke chal raha hun.
Customer: Chaliye sir chaar paanch din, main toh yeh keh raha hun 30 tareekh, ek do tareekh tak main 24 days ka apna cutting maan ke chal raha hun.
Executive: Paanch, paanch December tak aap dekh, kyunki Saturday Sunday office close rahega, Monday sir chutti hai hamari toh phir Tuesday se yaani ki.
Customer: 16 din, suniye, 16 din yeh ho gaye, main aage ke aur aath din maang raha hun, 24 din ka aap mera cut karke baaki.
Executive: Haan, haan, 24, 25 din aap, 24, 25 din aap maan lo, main koshish karunga jaldi, main isliye aapko bol raha hun kyunki bahut saare hamare client hote hain, kabhi kabhi sir aisa hota hai.
Customer: Koi baat nahi.
Executive: Kyunki rozana, rozana customer care pe call karte rehte hain sir.
Customer: Nahi nahi aisa kuch nahi hai, dekhiye 24 days, main aapke, aap mujhe bol rahe ho 22 ke liye, main phir bhi 24 days bol raha hun.
Executive: Sir main wahi bol raha hun, 24 ya 25 days jo bhi hoga woh dekh lenge.
Customer: Koi baat nahi, 25 pakad lijiye, 47,000 ka 365 se divide karke.
Executive: Haan, haan, 24 ko aapke baap ka hai, haan, woh aapka aa jayega, woh aa jayega.
Customer: Theek hai sir, thank you, thank you Aasim ji.
Executive: Baaki sir yeh jo aapki yeh jo complaint aayi hui thi main isko close kar raha hun, aapke paas feedback aayega toh please wahan satisfy feedback aap check kijiyega sir.
Customer: Nahi sir, satisfy feedback karunga jab refund ho jayega tab, ya phir aap mujhe ek mail daal do.
Executive: Haan, haan, main aapko usi according aapko mail daal deta hun, agar aapko lagta hai toh main aapko mail.
Customer: Aap mujhe ek mail, aap mujhe ek mail daal dijiye ke aath se 10 din mein aapka jo bhi matlab 24, five days ka paisa katne ke baad aapka refund ho jayega, main aapko turant kar deta hun.
Executive: Haan, haan, bilkul, bilkul, main aapko mail daal deta hun, main aapko.
Customer: Kyunki sir agar aap yeh complaint close nahi karoge toh aage process, sir woh complaint agar close nahi hogi toh woh aage proceed nahi hota hai isliye main aapko pehle bata raha hun, main mail daal deta hun aapko.
Customer: Koi baat nahi, aap mail daal dijiye theek hai sir.
Executive: Anujcoolboy1992@gmail.com.
Customer: Nahi, Anujv111992.
Executive: Nahi, aapka mail isi mail ID se aaya hua hai na sir aapke paas?
Customer: Aaya, aaya hua tha lekin baad mein aapki company se mujhe message aaya tha ki registered mail ID se mail kijiye toh maine usse bhi daal diya tha.
Executive: Aapki wohi registered mail ID bolti hai?
Customer: Anujv111992.
Executive: 11?
Customer: Sir suniye aap, aap, haan, Anujv, V for vanish.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: 111992.
Executive: 1992.
Customer: @gmail.com.
Executive: @gmail.com.
Executive: Anujv, theek hai sir main aapka.
Customer: V111992, wohi hai na jo foot se nahi hai.
Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: Thoda waisa rehta hai.
Executive: Sir 11, 11 sir jo hai woh digit mein hai na, 11, 11 ya E L E V E N 11?
Customer: Nahi nahi nahi, 111992.
Executive: Theek hai, 1992@gmail.com.
Executive: Theek hai, samajh gaya, samajh gaya, theek hai. Main aapko mail kar raha hun sir is mail ID par, theek hai aap confirmation de dijiyega mere ko.
Customer: Okay, okay.
Executive: Theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants refund for unused service period.

- Wants written confirmation of refund terms.



Resolution:

- Executive explained refund calculation based on usage.

- Executive promised to send email with refund details.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will send email with refund details.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, subscription, email, service closure
